columns.Game_ID: The unique identifier for each game.
columns.Title: The name of the video game.
columns.Release_Date: The launch date of the video game.
columns.Franchise: The series to which the game belongs.
columns.Platform_ID: The identifier for the gaming platform.
columns.Developers: The company or group that developed the game.
columns.Units_sold_Millions: The total sales of the game in millions.

game.table_description: The table stores detailed information about video games.

columns.Player_ID: The unique identifier for each player.
columns.Game_ID: The unique identifier for each game.
columns.If_active: The status indicating if the player is currently active.

game_player.table_description: The table links players to the games they engage with.

columns.Player_ID: The unique identifier for each player.
columns.Rank_of_the_year: The annual ranking position of the player.
columns.Position: The position the player plays in the game.
columns.College: The college from which the player graduated.

player.table_description: The table holds information about players and their ranking positions.

columns.Platform_ID: The unique identifier for each gaming platform.
columns.Platform_name: The name of the gaming platform.
columns.Market_district: The geographical area where the platform is marketed.
columns.Download_rank: The rank of the platform based on download frequency.

platform.table_description: The table contains information about different gaming platforms.
